prompt:
Task: For each ingredient, choose the best Woolworths SKU (from candidates) and suggest how many retail packs are needed.
        Use servings + archetype context to keep quantities realistic. If no candidate fits, set selected_product_id to null and explain in package_notes.
        After mapping ingredients, optionally rewrite the cooking steps to reference the chosen products.

        Archetype snapshot:
        ```json
        {
  "uid": "arch_3b4f9k",

  "core_tags": {

      "Flexitarian"
    ],
    "Cuisine": [
      "SouthAfrican",
      "ModernAmerican"
    ],
    "CuisineOpenness": [
      "FamiliarClassics"
    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "Under15"
    ],
    "Complexity": [
      "Simple"
    ],
    "HeatSpice": [
      "Mild"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Solo"
    ],
    "BudgetLevel": [
      "ValueStaples"
    ],
    "EthicsReligious": [],
    "Allergens": [
      "Gluten"
    ]
  }
}
        ```

        Meal draft:
        ```json
        {
  "name": "10-Min One-Pan Chutney Chickpea Couscous",
  "description": "A quick, mild, plant-forward couscous tossed with chickpeas, tomatoes, and a touch of South African chutney for sweet-savory comfort. All in one pan, ready in minutes.",
  "servings": "Single portion",
  "instructions": [
    "Heat a small nonstick pan over medium heat and add olive oil.",
    "Add onion and cook 2 minutes until just softened; add garlic and cook 30 seconds.",
    "Stir in cherry tomatoes and cook 1–2 minutes until they begin to soften.",
    "Add chickpeas, chutney, and a pinch of salt and pepper; stir to coat and warm through (about 1 minute).",
    "Pour in couscous and 3/4 cup hot water; stir once, bring to a brief simmer, then turn off heat, cover, and rest 5 minutes.",
    "Uncover, fluff with a fork, and fold in spinach to wilt (30–60 seconds).",
    "Finish with lemon juice and parsley; adjust salt and pepper to taste and serve."
  ],
  "ingredients": [
    {
      "core_item_name": "olive oil",
      "quantity": "1 tablespoon"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "onion",
      "quantity": "1/4 small",
      "preparation": "finely chopped"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "garlic",
      "quantity": "1 clove",
      "preparation": "minced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "cherry tomatoes",
      "quantity": "1 cup",
      "preparation": "halved"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "chickpeas",
      "quantity": "1/2 can (about 200 g)",
      "preparation": "drained and rinsed"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "chutney",
      "quantity": "1 tablespoon"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "couscous",
      "quantity": "1/2 cup (dry)"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "spinach",
      "quantity": "1 cup",
      "preparation": "roughly chopped"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "lemon",
      "quantity": "1/2",
      "preparation": "juiced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "parsley",
      "quantity": "1 tablespoon",
      "preparation": "chopped"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "salt and pepper",
      "quantity": "to taste"
    }
  ],
  "meal_tags": {
    "Diet": [
      "Flexitarian"
    ],
    "Cuisine": [
      "ModernAmerican",
      "SouthAfrican"
    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "Under15"
    ],
    "Complexity": [
      "Simple"
    ],
    "HeatSpice": [
      "Mild"
    ],
    "Allergens": [
      "Gluten"
    ],
    "BudgetLevel": [
      "ValueStaples"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Solo"
    ],
    "CuisineOpenness": [
      "FamiliarClassics"
    ],
    "NutritionFocus": [
      "HighFiber"
    ]
  }
}
        ```

  "updated_instructions": [
    "Heat a small nonstick pan over medium heat and add 1 Tbsp Woolies Cooking Olive Oil.",
    "Add 1/4 small chopped onion (from Brown Onions 1 kg) and cook 2 minutes until just softened; add 1 clove equivalent Woolies Fresh Crushed Garlic 50 g and cook 30 seconds.",
    "Stir in about 1 cup drained Woolies Whole Unpeeled Cherry Tomatoes 400 g (halve any large pieces) and cook 1–2 minutes until they begin to soften.",
    "Add 1/2 can Woolies Chickpeas in Brine 400 g, 1 Tbsp Woolies PEPPADEW Piquanté Pepper Chutney, and a pinch of salt and pepper; stir to coat and warm through (about 1 minute).",
    "Pour in 1/2 cup Woolies Wholewheat Couscous and 3/4 cup hot water; stir once, bring to a brief simmer, then turn off heat, cover, and rest 5 minutes.",
    "Uncover, fluff with a fork, and fold in 1 cup Woolies Baby Spinach to wilt (30–60 seconds).",
    "Finish with juice of 1/2 Woolies Lemon and 1 Tbsp chopped Woolies Fresh Italian Parsley; adjust salt and pepper to taste and serve."
